original_title: Truth behind Easter Sunday attacks will come out soon: Cardinal
original_body_lines: The truth behind the Easter Sunday attacks will be revealed soon as some of those who are behind the attacks will betray their own, Archbishop of Colombo Cardinal Malcolm Ranjith said today.
Speaking during the traditional Vespers Service at St. Anthony’s Shrine in Kochichikade, Cardinal Ranjith said divine powers will reveal the truth behind the Easter Sunday attacks soon.

"Those who hide the truth can mislead us. However, they are wrong, as we will not be misled.  Those who were behind the attacks will betray their own and the truth will come out with divine help,” the Cardinal said.
He also said that those who were behind the attacks are holding high posts today.
“Ministers are trying to introduce new laws daily and are trying to hide the truth,” he further alleged. (Yohan Perera)
